attributes.description: a charming, virtually one owner from new [ 42 0f the 47 years ] example of the Michelotti designed, uniquely south african car, the Apache was popular, and was produced from 1971 TO 1977. It has survived well, being almost entirely original [ apart from the plumbers tape on the driving seat !!!]. The car drives well and is testimony to careful long term ownership. On the button and ready to bring nostalgia or join a uniquely South African vehicle collection somewhere?
attributes.title: 1975 Austin Apache A
